name: Speed Duel (Rule Card)
text:
RULES:
? Main Deck size is 20-30 cards.
? Extra Deck size is 0-6 cards.
? Side Deck size is 0-6 cards.
? Starting LP is 4000.
? Starting hand is 4 cards.
? Only 3 columns on field. Pendulum Scales go in the leftmost and rightmost Spell/Trap Zone.
? No Main Phase 2. You cannot use cards that need a Main Phase 2.
